story_stone_02_01000/2401_1201_0300_10:
You know those mysterious stones that everyone’s
been talking about? We found some, too!
story_stone_02_01000/2401_1201_0400_10: Really?! Where did you find them?
story_stone_02_01000/2401_1201_0500_10:
Erm... Well, I found them by coincidence when I
was battling in town...
story_stone_02_01000/2401_1201_0700_10:
My Veevees also found some when we were
walking around town...
story_stone_02_01000/2401_1201_0800_10: As I thought—they don’t seem to be ordinary ores.
story_stone_02_01000/2401_1201_0900_10:
I have a question for the two of you, as you’re
both from Paldea.
story_stone_02_01000/2401_1201_1000_10: Are these stones similar to Tera Jewels?
story_stone_02_01000/2401_1201_1100_10:
Hmm... I’m not an expert or anything, so I’m not
too sure...
story_stone_02_01000/2401_1201_1200_10:
but the energy these stones give off kinda feels
different to me.
story_stone_02_01000/2401_1201_1300_10:
The way the stones sparkle and shine is different,
too, isn’t it?
story_stone_02_01000/2401_1201_1400_10:
Yup yup! It’s different, all right—though these
stones are pretty, too!
story_stone_02_01000/2401_1201_1600_10: If you find them again, let me know!
